verses.verse: David <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> and he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it a <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "No one ought to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> but the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> them to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H5704>him<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>at<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to its <S%H4725>place,<s%> which he had prepared for <S%H3559>it.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> together the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> <S%H222>Uriel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty;<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty;<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom,<s%> <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty;<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H469>Elizaphan,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred;<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H8084>eighty;<s%>
of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8147>twelve.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> for <S%H222>Uriel,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah,<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7218>them,<s%> "You are the heads of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> <S%H251>yourselves,<s%> both you and your brothers, that you may bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the place that I have prepared for <S%H3559>it.<s%>

For because you <S%H7223>didn't<s%> carry it at first, <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> made <S%H6555>broke<s%> out against <S%H1875>us,<s%> because we didn't seek him according to the <S%H4941>ordinance.<s%>"

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> themselves to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> on their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> with the <S%H4133>poles<s%> <S%H4872>thereon,<s%> as Moses <S%H6680>commanded<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5975>appoint<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> stringed <S%H3627>instruments<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> <S%H8085>sounding<s%> aloud and lifting <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel;<s%> and of his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah;<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6984>Kushaiah;<s%>

and with them their <S%H251>brothers<s%> of the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H2148>degree,<s%> Zechariah, <S%H1122>Ben,<s%> and <S%H3268>Jaaziel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H6042>Unni,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H466>Eliphelehu,<s%> and <S%H4737>Mikneiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-Edom,<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> the <S%H7778>doorkeepers.<s%>
So the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> were given <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> to sound <S%H8085>aloud;<s%>

and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H5815>Aziel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H6042>Unni,<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> with stringed <S%H5035>instruments<s%> set to <S%H5961>Alamoth;<s%>

and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H466>Eliphelehu,<s%> and <S%H4737>Mikneiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-Edom,<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H5812>Azaziah,<s%> with <S%H3658>harps<s%> tuned to the <S%H8067>eight-stringed<s%> lyre, to <S%H5329>lead.<s%>
<S%H3663>Chenaniah,<s%> <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> was over the <S%H4853>song:<s%> he <S%H3256>instructed<s%> about the <S%H4853>song,<s%> because he was <S%H995>skillful.<s%>
<S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

<S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> and <S%H3146>Joshaphat,<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethanel,<s%> and <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H2690>blew<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> and <S%H3174>Jehiah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> with <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

It <S%H430>happened,<s%> when God <S%H5826>helped<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3736>clothed<s%> with a <S%H4598>robe<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and all the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%> the <S%H8269>master<s%> of the <S%H4853>song<s%> with the <S%H7891>singers:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> had on him an <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H906>linen.<s%>

Thus all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> and with <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>cornet,<s%> and with <S%H2689>trumpets,<s%> and with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> sounding <S%H8085>aloud<s%> with stringed <S%H5035>instruments<s%> and <S%H3658>harps.<s%>

It <S%H727>happened,<s%> as the ark of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> that <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> looked <S%H8259>out<s%> at the <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7540>dancing<s%> and <S%H7832>playing;<s%> and she <S%H959>despised<s%> him in her <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
